value.description: <Radio/> Logotype. When the<Radio/> change event is checked,<RadioGroup/> the value will be carried<Radio/> by the change event
value.description_zh: <Radio/> 标识。当该<Radio/> 选中时，<RadioGroup/>的 change 事件会携带<Radio/>的 value

checked.description: Whether or not it is currently selected

color.description: The color of radio is the same as the color of css
color.description_zh: Radio 的颜色，同 css 的 color

nativeProps.description: Used to transparently transfer properties on WebComponents to internal H5 labels
nativeProps.description_zh: 用于透传 WebComponents 上的属性到内部 H5 标签上

ariaLabel.description_zh: 无障碍访问，（属性）元素的额外描述

onChange.description: The change event is triggered when the selection in changes
onChange.description_zh: 中的选中项发生变化时触发 change 事件
